snippet.title: Final Outpost: Definitive Edition | Announcement Trailer (PC/Mac/Linux)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM : https://cutt.ly/WexvlktV

We are excited to announce that Final Outpost: Definitive Edition is coming soon to PC/Mac/Linux!

That’s right, it’s a Definitive Edition. That means we’ll be taking the original popular mobile strategy game to a new level with more features, content, and replayability as we wrap up our creative journey into a complete premium game without microtransactions. The game will be available in 16 languages across 5 platforms (PC, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS).

Find out more about this upcoming release here - https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/3066310/view/4348873261936067365?l=english

| DOWNLOAD |
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/final-outpost/id1425444801
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ExabyteGames.FinalOutpost

| WEBSITE |
https://www.finaloutpostgame.com

| FOLLOW ON OUR SOCIALS |
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/finaloutpost/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/finaloutpost/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/finaloutpostgame/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@finaloutpost

| JOIN THE COMMUNITY |
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/FinalOutpost/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/dn96Jxj
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/finaloutpost
